text:
Karl Bernhard Dall (, 1 February 1941 – 23 November 2020) was a German comedian, singer, and television presenter. He was born in Emden, Lower Saxony. He was known for his roles in "Freddy in the Wild West", "Hotel Clausewitz" and "Student of the Bedroom".
He was known for having a 'hanging' eye was caused by a congenital ptosis.
On 11 November 2020, Dall was hospitalized after having a stroke while on set for "Rote Rosen" in Munich. He died twelve days later on 23 November at the age of 79.
